My Work

Check out some of my projects...

MyTivity

Android application developed in Kotlin, together with Robin, Markus & Elias. This application helps users find people for different kinds of fun activities.

Kostdagboken

iOS application developed using Swift, toghther with David & Alexander. This application helps users with their weight goals, depending if they want to lose or gain weight.

Kortspel

Cardgames is a application developed in Swift. This application helps users find different cardgames and explains how you play them. It works perfect on a phone or a tablet.

Bored

Bored is developed both for Android and iOS. This application is perfekt when you are bored and need inspiration on new things to do.
